message: Let's split it evenly, Bob. Fair is fair, right?
I think I deserve a bit more, 60-40 is still a good deal for you!
Okay, Bob, I'll give you a little more. But 55-45 is my final offer. Take it or leave it.
Come on, Alice! I'm starting to feel the pinch from inflation. 58-42 is a fair compromise, don't you think?
